Ingridients: Vegetable oil, onion, garlic, carrots, courgette, chickpeas, chopped tomatoes, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cumin, ground coriander, water, couscous
Procedure: Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 diced onion and 2 crushed cloves of garlic, add 3 diced medium carrots, 1 diced large courgette, 400g tin chickpeas, 400g tin chopped tomatoes, 1 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon, 1 1/2 tsp ground ginger, 1 1/2 tsp ground cumin, 1/2 tsp ground coriander, 700ml boiling water, prepare 350g couscous separately, and serve stew with couscous.

Ingridients: Vegetable oil, tofu, onion, garlic, ground coriander, ground cumin, hot chilli powder, frozen peppers, black beans, sweetcorn, chopped tomatoes, wholewheat tortillas, Cheddar cheese, iceberg lettuce
Procedure: Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 280g tofu, 1 diced onion, and 1 crushed clove of garlic; add 1 tsp ground coriander, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1/2 tsp hot chilli powder, 150g frozen peppers; add 400g tin black beans, 200g tin sweetcorn, and 400g tin chopped tomatoes; heat 8 tortillas; assemble tacos with tofu mixture, 50g Cheddar cheese, and 80g iceberg lettuce.

Ingridients: Brown rice, vegetable oil, red onion, garlic, frozen peppers, ground coriander, ground cumin, smoked paprika, chilli flakes, green lentils, red kidney beans, chopped tomatoes, black pepper, Cheddar cheese
Procedure: Cook 300g brown rice, heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 diced large red onion and 2 crushed cloves of garlic, add 150g frozen peppers, 1 tsp ground coriander, 1 tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/4 tsp chilli flakes, 2 x 400g tins green lentils, 400g tin red kidney beans, 2 x 400g tins chopped tomatoes, black pepper, top with 50g Cheddar cheese.

Ingridients: Vegetable oil, onion, garlic, carrot, spring onions, mushrooms, spring cabbage, vegetable stock cube, water, Chinese 5 spice, soy sauce, eggs, egg noodle nests, sesame seeds
Procedure: Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 sliced onion, 1 crushed clove of garlic, 1 sliced carrot, and 1 bunch of spring onions; add 100g mushrooms, 100g spring cabbage, 1 vegetable stock cube, 1.2l water, 1 tsp Chinese 5 spice, 1 tsp soy sauce; boil 4 eggs; cook 125g egg noodles; assemble bowls with noodles, ramen mixture, and eggs.

Ingridients: Brown rice, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, curry powder, sweet potato, spinach, water, chickpeas
Procedure: Cook 300g brown rice, heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 sliced onion and 2 crushed cloves of garlic, add 1 tbsp curry powder, add 500g sweet potato, 250g spinach, 500ml water, simmer, add 400g chickpeas, and simmer again.

Ingridients: Spaghetti, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, mushrooms, black pepper, passata, dried basil, dried oregano, butter beans, soft cheese, Cheddar cheese
Procedure: Cook 300g spaghetti, heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 diced onion, 2 crushed cloves of garlic, and 150g mushrooms, add black pepper, 500g passata, 1 tsp dried basil, 2 tsp dried oregano, 400g butter beans, mix with spaghetti, bake, and top with 50g Cheddar cheese.

Ingridients: White fish, potatoes, chopped tomatoes, carrots, peas, dried basil, dried oregano, dried mint, black pepper, water
Procedure: Combine 4 fillets white fish, 2 x 567g potatoes, 2 x 400g chopped tomatoes, 250g carrots, 250g peas, 3 tsp dried basil, 3 tsp dried oregano, 3 tsp dried mint, black pepper, 200ml water in a pan, bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until fish is cooked.

Name Of Recipe: Peri-Peri Chicken with Spicy Jollof-Style Rice
Ingridients: Vegetable oil, onion, garlic, chicken breasts, cayenne pepper, smoked paprika, ground turmeric, chilli flakes, dried thyme, red pepper, chicken stock cube, water, chopped tomatoes, brown rice, frozen peas
Procedure: Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil, sauté 1 diced onion, 2 crushed cloves of garlic, and 4 chicken breasts; add 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1 tsp ground turmeric, 1 tsp chilli flakes, 1/2 tsp dried thyme; add 1 sliced red pepper, 1 chicken stock cube, 1 litre water, 400g chopped tomatoes, 300g brown rice, 200g frozen peas.

Ingridients: Eggs, semi-skimmed milk, rolled oats, baking powder, bananas, blackberries
Procedure: Mix 2 eggs, 300ml milk, 100g rolled oats, 1 tsp baking powder, 2 bananas, 200g blackberries and bake in the oven or microwave until cooked.

Ingridients: Pears, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, mixed spice, water, pecans
Procedure: Combine 4 pears, 1/2 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp ground cinnamon, 1/2 tsp mixed spice, 500ml water in a saucepan, bring to a boil, simmer until pears are tender, remove pears, and sprinkle with 20g pecans.

Ingridients: Fettuccine, chicken breast, cream, garlic, parmesan, olive oil, salt, pepper
Procedure: Boil pasta. Sauté garlic and chicken. Add cream and cheese. Mix with pasta.

Ingridients: Beef, mushrooms, onion, garlic, sour cream, pasta, olive oil, salt, pepper
Procedure: Cook beef and mushrooms with onions. Add sour cream. Serve with pasta.

Ingridients: Ziti pasta, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, marinara sauce, basil, garlic, olive oil
Procedure: Cook pasta. Mix with sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly and golden.

Ingridients: Rice, shrimp, eggs, green peas, carrots, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic
Procedure: Stir-fry vegetables and shrimp. Add rice and scrambled eggs. Mix in soy sauce.

Ingridients: Bell peppers, ground beef, rice, tomato sauce, onion, garlic, cheese
Procedure: Stuff peppers with beef and rice mixture. Bake with tomato sauce and cheese.

Ingridients: Salmon fillets, garlic, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper
Procedure: Melt butter in a pan, add garlic, sear salmon skin side down, flip and baste with garlic butter, finish with lemon juice and parsley.

Ingridients: Chickpeas, spinach, onion, garlic, tomato paste, cumin, olive oil, vegetable broth
Procedure: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil. Add tomato paste, cumin, chickpeas, and broth. Simmer and stir in spinach.

Ingridients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, onion, garlic, white wine, vegetable broth, parmesan, butter
Procedure: Sauté onions and garlic, add mushrooms. Stir in rice and wine. Gradually add broth, stirring until creamy. Finish with butter and cheese.

Ingridients: Canned jackfruit, BBQ sauce, onion, garlic, buns, coleslaw mix
Procedure: Shred jackfruit, sauté with onion and garlic. Add BBQ sauce, simmer. Serve on buns with coleslaw.

Ingridients: Green curry paste, coconut milk, chicken or tofu, eggplant, bamboo shoots, basil, fish sauce
Procedure: Sauté curry paste, add coconut milk, protein, and vegetables. Simmer until cooked. Garnish with basil.
